title: What's New
cleaned_text: Welcome to Arizona Board of Homeopathic and Integrated Medicine Examiners About Us Directory of Physicians Learn More Previous Next Mission Statement The Board's mission is to protect the health, safety and welfare of Arizona citizens by examining, licensing and regulating homeopathic physicians and medical assistants. What's New 15 May 2022 FY2025 Budget Submittal 13 April 2020 Covid-19 CE Deferrals and late fee waivers Homeopathic Physicians. Pursuant to Executive Order 2020-17 the Board voted to defer Continuing Education Requirements for all licensees renewing between March 01, 2020 - September 01, 2020 for 6 months. This means that if your license expires...
